attributes.additional_details: Because many vulnerable elderly people in care homes need family connections and interactions for their mental well being as do persons whose relatives are in care homes
attributes.background: I would ask government to consider providing the vaccine to the elderly confined in care in order they can at last see family members and loved ones with a degree of confidence, as many families have not seen loved ones since March 2020

rejection.details: Residents in care homes are already the top priority group for receiving Covid-19 vaccination: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/priority-groups-for-coronavirus-covid-19-vaccination-advice-from-the-jcvi-2-december-2020/priority-groups-for-coronavirus-covid-19-vaccination-advice-from-the-jcvi-2-december-2020
